Rulings.Edison:
●Gren Maju Da Eiza's effect includes cards removed from play face-down with Lightforce Sword or Different Dimension Capsule.
●If you equip Axe of Despair to Gren Maju Da Eiza, calculate its ATK and DEF according to its effect, then add +1000 ATK on top of that.
●If Gren Maju Da Eiza is equipped with Megamorph, its ATK is zero, but if Megamorph leaves play, recalculate its ATK using its effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Gren Maju Da Eiza" includes cards removed from play face-down with "Lightforce Sword" or "Different Dimension Capsule".\n2. If you equip "Axe of Despair" to "Gren Maju Da Eiza", calculate its ATK and DEF according to its effect, then add +1000 ATK on top of that.\n3. If "Gren Maju Da Eiza" is equipped with "Megamorph", its ATK is zero, but if "Megamorph" leaves play, recalculate its ATK using its effect.
